text: aladhin haramhm allah taealaa min naeim alakhirat hum aladhin jaealuu aldiyn aldhy 'amrihim allah batbaeh batilana wlhwana, wkhdethm alhayat aldunya wshghlu bzkharfha ean aleamal llakhrt, fywm alqiamat ynsahm allah taealaa wytrkhm fi aleadhab almwje, kama tarakuu aleamal liliqa' yawmihim hdha, wlkwnhm badlt allah wbrahynh yunkirun mae eilmuhum bi'anaha hq
